TestInformation.Title: Renaissance
TestInformation.Description: Renaissance is a suite of benchmarks designed to test the Java JVM from Apache Spark to a Twitter-like service to Scala and other features.

Entry.Name: Akka Unbalanced Cobwebbed Tree
Entry.Message: Runs the Unbalanced Cobwebbed Tree actor workload in Akka.

Entry.Name: Savina Reactors.IO
Entry.Message: Runs benchmarks inspired by the Savina microbenchmark workloads in a sequence on Reactors.IO.

Entry.Name: Apache Spark ALS
Entry.Message: Runs the ALS algorithm from the Spark MLlib.

Entry.Name: Random Forest
Entry.Message: Runs the Random Forest algorithm from Spark MLlib.

Entry.Name: Apache Spark Bayes
Entry.Message: Runs the multinomial naive Bayes algorithm from the Spark MLlib.

Entry.Name: Apache Spark PageRank
Entry.Message: Runs a number of PageRank iterations, using RDDs.

Entry.Name: In-Memory Database Shootout
Entry.Message: Executes a shootout test using several in-memory databases.

Entry.Name: Scala Dotty
Entry.Message: Runs the Random Forest algorithm from Spark MLlib.

Entry.Name: Twitter Finagle
Entry.Message: Simulates a microblogging service using Twitter Finagle.

Entry.Name: Twitter HTTP Requests
Entry.Message: Sends many small Finagle HTTP requests to a Finagle HTTP server and awaits response.

Entry.Name: Genetic Algorithm Using Jenetics + Futures
Entry.Message: Runs a genetic algorithm using the Jenetics library and futures.
